features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against creatures within 5 ft. of any ally that is not incapacitated.

features.name: Bite
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

features.name: Trip
features.description: When you hit a creature with advantage. Save: DC 10 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is prone.
